attributes.description:
2014 Renault Duster 1.5 dCi Dynamique 4x4 manual for sale. 
Don't miss this light on fuel budget SUV. Exactly what one would need with the current fuel prices. Loads of space and performance included in this package. 
Standard Features: Full Service History, Navigation System, Rear PDC, Bluetooth, Air Con, Power Steering, Air Bags, Electric Mirrors & Windows, Central Locking, Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Aux Plug, USB Port, Smash & Grab.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Renault Duster 1.5 dCi Dynamique 4x4
Power - 80 kW @ 3900 rpm
Torque - 240 Nm @ 1750 rpm
Economy - 6.9 l/100km
Emissions - 143 g/km
Emissions Rating - EU4
Gears - 6 / All
Acceleration - 12.5 seconds
Top Speed - 170 km/h
Airbags (total) - 4
Length - 4,315 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 50 liters
Boot Capacity - 475 liters
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
